dcterms:description: A new labeled dataset of approximately 1,500 video traffic accidents collected from dashboard cameras on YouTube, containing various types of traffic accidents with labeled start and end times.
dcterms:title: AnAn Accident Detection (A3D)

dcterms:creator: Y. Yao
M. Xu
C. Choi
D. J. Crandall
E. M. Atkins
B. Dariush
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for future object localization, consisting of 230 on-road videos at intersections in the San Francisco Bay Area, with each video lasting between 10 to 60 seconds.
dcterms:title: Honda Egocentric View Intersection (HEV-I)

dcterms:creator: F.-H. Chan
Y.-T. Chen
Y. Xiang
M. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset of crowd-sourced dashcam videos used for anticipating accidents, containing various traffic scenarios.
dcterms:title: Street Accidents (SA)
